author: Brian Woo
comment: Custom vibration didn't seem to work properly for WhatsApp messages.  It works when I run a Test from Lightflow, but when an actual message comes in, the custom vibration does not work.

author: Michael James
comment: I've been using this app for years, across several phones.  It's one of the first apps I install on a new phone, and I'm not sure what I'd do without it.  The author has always corrected any issues that have come up.  Thank you!

author: Divij Chand
comment: the notification light stopped functioning after the most recent update...

author: A Google User
comment: This has been a favorite app of mine for years. Works great. The only frustrating thing with the Android O update is that it now shows up in 2 persistent notifications in the drop down panel. Not the app's fault but it's starting to take up a lot of notification real estate. Hopefully Android O or the app allows a workaround.

reply.author: Reactle
reply.content: Could you email me to try go through this a bit more as I'm not seeing this myself.

author: David Quinonez
comment: The app is great, and infinitely customizable. I do notice an issue on my nexus 5X where the app plays the default notification sound under the customized notification sound. You simply turn off the default notification in settings to correct, but I didn't know if this was a bug or not.    Running Android 8, 10/05 security update

author: Ryan Hoyt
comment: The latest update seems to have broken the LED on Android O.  I only ever get a white, quick fishing light now.  Was working perfectly for the prior several years!

author: Jon Bayless
comment: I've looked a long time for this level of control and customization for notifications. With the new interface updates, even the settings are impressive. Thanks for your hard work, this is easily worth the purchase.  In case google is targeting this app over any use of the accessibility API, you can tell them this: I have significant hearing loss so the ability to customize ringtones, vibration patterns, LED patterns and screen wake behavior and all the other things Light Flow does is absolutely critical to my ability to use my Android devices effectively. Until Android has native abilities that match Light Flow, I need it to make it possible for me to see, hear or feel when my phone needs my attention. The normal features of Android are not enough.

author: Michael Dinale
comment: With the new Google's app Reply, all notifications are overridden by this app making Light Flow unusable. Is there a way to fix the problem without uninstalling the application? Thanks

author: .jewels.
comment: Upgraded from the lite version to the full version. The led lights/colors work perfectly on my Galaxy S8. I'm happy to find a led notification program that is compatible with my phone! Definitely worth  trying out!  You won't be disappointed!  5 stars all the way!!!!

author: Khalid Abdul
comment: Worked fine in the past with my Huawei Mate 9 on Nougat. Since the Oreo Update (EMUI 8) Lightflow only triggers sporadically. Even though I have it running in root mode and have granted notification access as well as accessibility.

author: Jarrett Motz
comment: Used this on my Nexus 5 for it's entire lifespan. I just upgraded to the pixel XL and it works perfectly still. Can't have a phone without it.

author: Trevor Galivan
comment: Great app. Tons of features and customization, tons of compatibility options too. One suggestion would be the ability to group notifications into different categories, I.E. a folder for all my individual messenger notifications I've set up.

author: uday kumar
comment: Not working properly when the ambient display is turned on. Notification lights appear once but once the ambient display is turned on notification lights stops. Please fix this issue.

author: Jax otea
comment: Used to be great, got it as soon as I had a phone with a colour led. Unfortunately accidentally Uninstalled and now I can't get the led to work at all and the notification importance can't be changed (I had it on low before to reduce real estate usage).

author: Sudeepta Kataki
comment: Not really stable...sometimes a dim flash appears before showing the actual notification flash...cannot flash the colour i have selected for some colours in my galaxy s7

author: Marko Anicic
comment: On nexus 5 work perfectly, now i have Oneplus 5 first thing i download  this app and spend 40 min with trying to works but still don't work. Same suggestions, thanks

author: Anubis Grows
comment: Don't leave a bad review because you do not understand how things works. 5 stars Dev.

author: Ulisse Paris Artuso
comment: It doesn't work on MIUI 9 Developer Build. Can't "view" outstanding notifications. Only works when the device is charging. WhatsApp/Telegram don't work.

author: Marcel Uithoof
comment: Not working correctly anymore on my LG G5 when screen is off and notification arrives

author: Aadithya Kumar
comment: Nothing seams to work. Wasted my money for this. I need a refund. A complete waste of money.

author: Felix Castillo
comment: Any way we can get the app to ignore the (.nomedia) file so that custom notifications can still be visible and configured/set? ATM I'd see all my custom notifications on my Google Play music library if I didn't have that custom file name in the folder of custom notifications.

author: Ben Subbarao
comment: Brilliant app.  Tried the trial and never hesitated to purchase the Pro. The price could possibly be increased for the customization it offers.  Great app to know what's awaiting before you unlock.

author: Scott Jalbert
comment: If you have a notification light Light Flow can make it much more useful. Works great under android 8 Oreo too.

author: Deepak Munjal
comment: How do you set up the audio stream for text to speech to pause the music?  Or to use the right stream when Bluetooth is connected but not selected?

author: Eli Strebel
comment: Been using it for years, updates on time, bugs get fixed. Works well.

author: Dean Smith
comment: Literally got this app so Snapchat would flash a yellow light, but flashes orange on Samsung S8?!? Please sort this out!!

author: Chris Brooks
comment: Not working on my new s8+

author: Cynthia Carlon
comment: New version works excellent w/ my Note 8

author: phani kumar
comment: It is not working Nokia 6

author: Gregg Landess
comment: Used work, now this and legacy doesn't work anymore for Samsung Galaxy 8
Not working with Android 8.1 on Nexus 5X

author: Yusuf Islam
comment: Brilliant but need to manually clear notifications at times

author: lohith p menon
comment: Installed on Nexus 6with root access. But no notification is shown.

author: Ahmad Sawalha
comment: More settings, such as light pulse

author: Daniel Bertles
comment: Love this app. Lots of ability to customize.

author: Marlon Buchanan
comment: Been using for years but doesn't seem to work on my oneplus 5...

author: Greg Matthews
comment: Needs to be fixed for Go SMS.
title: Go SMS

author: Kyle Heneman
comment: Could really use an update. Timing seems to be random for duration and period

author: YiQian Ang
comment: That will be great.
title: Multi color flash for single notification.

author: Andy L
comment: Doesn't work well on the essential phone
